title: Turtle Wax 53838 Hybrid Solutions Graphene Acrylic Trim Restorer, Brings Dull Faded Exterior Plastic and Trim Back to Life Permanently, Protects from Future Damage, 10 oz
description: Turtle Wax's Hybrid Solutions Graphene Acrylic Trim Restorer goes beyond just restoration. This advanced formula is the ultimate solution to restore and protects exterior trim as well as plastic almost immediately and with ease, providing superior protection from harsh sunrays, car washings, road salts and more. Unlike other trim restorers, this coating won't disappear in a few days and lasts indefinitely. Dry to the touch within minutes of applying allowing you to drive off and showcase that dark, wet, deep shine in no time at all. Treat your trim to the best of the best with Hybrid Solutions Graphene Acrylic Trim Restorer
